sentence: COMMERCE, Ga. President Donald Trump's stamp of approval was supposed to turn former Sen. David Perdue of Georgia into the favorite to beat incumbent Brian Kemp for the Republican gubernatorial nomination here.
title: Trump's clout tested as he seeks to oust Georgia's GOP governor
